item0.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
item0.description:
65 Ability Power
45 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active - Stasis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).

item1.name: Night Harvester
item1.description:
90 Ability Power
300 Health
15 Ability Haste
  • Soulrend: Damaging a champion deals an additional (125 +15% Ability Power magic damage) and grants you 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown per champion).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

    Damaging a new champion will extend the duration of the Move Speed bonus.

item2.name: Void Staff
item2.description:
65 Ability Power
40% Magic Penetration

item3.name: Morellonomicon
item3.description:
70 Ability Power
250 Health
  • Affliction: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. If the target is below 50% Health, this effect is increased to 60% Grievous Wounds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item4.name: Fiendish Codex
item4.description:
35 Ability Power
10 Ability Haste

item5.name: Sorcerer's Shoes
item5.description:
18 Magic Penetration
45 Move Speed

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Arcane Comet
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.

item0.name: Doran's Ring
item0.description:
15 Ability Power
70 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

45 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active - Stasis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).

40 Ability Power

45 Move Speed

item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

item3.name: Dark Seal
item3.description:
15 Ability Power
40 Health
  • Glory: Gain 2 stacks for a champion kill or 1 stacks for an assist (up to 10 stacks total). Lose 4 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory.

    Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Mejai's Soulstealer.

item4.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
item4.description:
120 Ability Power
  • Magical Opus: Increases your total Ability Power by 35%.

item5.name: Mercury's Treads
item5.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item5.name: Doran's Shield
item5.description:
80 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Recovery: Restores 6 Health every 5 seconds.
  • Endure: Restores up to 40 Health over 8 seconds after taking damage from a champion, large jungle monster, or epic jungle monster. Restoration increases when you are low Health.

    Endure 66% effective when owned by Ranged champions or when taking damage from area of effect or periodic damage sources.

  • Soulrend: Damaging a champion deals an additional (125 +15% Ability Power magic damage) and grants you 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown per champion).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

    Damaging a new champion will extend the duration of the Move Speed bonus.

item4.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item4.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item5.name: Doran's Ring
item5.description:
15 Ability Power
70 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Arcane Comet
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.

item0.name: Mercury's Treads
item0.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item1.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
item1.description:
65 Ability Power
45 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active - Stasis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).

item2.name: Night Harvester
item2.description:
90 Ability Power
300 Health
15 Ability Haste
  • Soulrend: Damaging a champion deals an additional (125 +15% Ability Power magic damage) and grants you 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown per champion).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

    Damaging a new champion will extend the duration of the Move Speed bonus.

item3.name: Morellonomicon
item3.description:
70 Ability Power
250 Health
  • Affliction: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. If the target is below 50% Health, this effect is increased to 60% Grievous Wounds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item3.name: Night Harvester
item3.description:
90 Ability Power
300 Health
15 Ability Haste
  • Soulrend: Damaging a champion deals an additional (125 +15% Ability Power magic damage) and grants you 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown per champion).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

    Damaging a new champion will extend the duration of the Move Speed bonus.

item4.name: Doran's Ring
item4.description:
15 Ability Power
70 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

item5.name: Boots
item5.description: 25 Move Speed

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Arcane Comet
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.

item0.name: Mercury's Treads
item0.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item1.name: Broken Stopwatch
item1.description:
• Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

item2.name: Dark Seal
item2.description:
15 Ability Power
40 Health
  • Glory: Gain 2 stacks for a champion kill or 1 stacks for an assist (up to 10 stacks total). Lose 4 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory.

    Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Mejai's Soulstealer.

item3.name: Morellonomicon
item3.description:
70 Ability Power
250 Health
  • Affliction: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. If the target is below 50% Health, this effect is increased to 60% Grievous Wounds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

300 Health
15 Ability Haste
  • Soulrend: Damaging a champion deals an additional (125 +15% Ability Power magic damage) and grants you 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown per champion).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

    Damaging a new champion will extend the duration of the Move Speed bonus.

item5.description:
15 Ability Power
70 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).
